title: damage
body: when i lane as the same champion with the same masteries and runes and against the same opponent champion i notice sometimes the same abilities and basic attacks does good damage but sometimes it does a lot less. why is this so?

replies.body:
Several reasons for this. 

+ There's a mastery called Merciless which gives you 5% damage to champions under 40% health. 
+ If you have Fervor of Battle you can deal more damage if you were in combat the longest.

+ It's also possible that you're proccing Thunderlord's but don't know it, or are unable to see it due to a visual bug.

+ What's most likely is that you're simply a higher level that you're opponent. 1 level can make a big difference.
